method.name: isBleepEnabled
method.comment: Get the bleep enabled value associated with this builder Return type: @return:

method.name: withBackfacingCamera
method.comment: Makes the barcode scanner use the camera facing back

method.name: isFlashEnabledByDefault
method.comment: Get the flash enabled by default value associated with this builder Return type: @return:

method.name: CenterTracker
method.comment: Enables the default center tracker. This tracker is always visible and turns green when a barcode is found.\n Please note that you can still scan a barcode outside the center tracker! This is purely a visual change. Return type: @return:

method.name: withOnlyQRCodeScanning
method.comment: Enables exclusive scanning on QR Codes, no other barcodes will be detected Return type: @return:

method.name: withCenterTracker
method.comment: Enables the center tracker with a custom drawable resource. This tracker is always visible.\n Please note that you can still scan a barcode outside the center tracker! This is purely a visual change. trackerResourceId: a drawable resource id detectedTrackerResourceId: a drawable resource id for the detected tracker state Return type: @return:

method.name: withOnly2DScanning
method.comment: Enables exclusive scanning on EAN-13, EAN-8, UPC-A, UPC-E, Code-39, Code-93, Code-128, ITF and Codabar barcodes. Return type: @return:

method.name: EnableAutoFocus
method.comment: Enables or disables auto focusing on the camera

method.name: withFrontfacingCamera
method.comment: Makes the barcode scanner use camera facing front

method.name: setTrackerColor
method.comment: Sets the tracker color used by the barcode scanner, By default this is Material Red 500 (#F44336). color:

method.name: withOnly3DScanning
method.comment: Enables exclusive scanning on QR Code, Data Matrix, PDF-417 and Aztec barcodes. Return type: @return:

method.name: build
method.comment: Build a ready to use MaterialBarcodeScanner Return type: @return:A ready to use MaterialBarcodeScanner

method.name: BleepEnabled
method.comment: Enables or disables a bleep sound whenever a barcode is scanned

method.name: FlashLightEnabledByDefault
method.comment: Shows a text message at the top of the barcode scanner

method.name: setText
method.comment: Shows a text message at the top of the barcode scanner

property.name: CameraSource
property.comment: Get the camera source associated with this builder

property.name: BarcodeDetector
property.comment: Get the barcode detector associated with this builder

property.name: TrackerColor
property.comment: Get the tracker color associated with this builder

property.name: Activity
property.comment: Get the activity associated with this builder

property.name: TrackerResourceID
property.comment: Get the tracker resource id value associated with this builder

property.name: Text
property.comment: Get the text associated with this builder

property.name: TrackerDetectedResourceID
property.comment: Get the tracker detected resource id value associated with this builder

property.name: ScannerMode
property.comment: Get the scanner mode value associated with this builder

method.name: startScan
method.comment:
Start a scan for a barcode
This opens a new activity with the parameters provided by the MaterialBarcodeScannerBuilder
